name: Astro Kat Demo V1.1
description:
(Coming Soon)

The first public demo build for Astro Kat.

This build is to get a feel for the game atmosphere, it is missing puzzles/dungeons/better combat

  • Explore the handful of areas
  • Kill simple enemies
  • Chat with NPC's
  • Complete quests
  • Find new outfits, weapons, and items
